name: Catch
description:
-Catch is  a minimalist game where  the main chracter Pep 95 must collect only the good Equipement from all the equipement that jane is throwing at him in order to repair his body and upgrade it up to 5 upgrades ( only 3 available ) 

- How To Play - Catch have  minimalized controls where you only use swipe to move your character and. the distance you want to reach is controled by the amount of energy you use in every swipe,
